content: create your own adorable penguin in just a few hours this easy-to-follow pattern includes one pdf file with detailed instructions on how to crochet and assemble all the parts to make animals only basic crocheting skills will be needed chain single_crochet slip_stitch increasing and decreasing crochet in magic_ring and an oval puff the pdf file included 8 pages pattern is available only in english hope you will enjoy making these toys please respect my as a designer and do not make the pattern public/ do not sell or copy send your friends to my etsy shop instead
